Description.Name: Evan Scrawl
Description.Details: Evan Scrawl, callsign "Hybrid", a skilled MechWarrior with a unique advantage on the battlefield. At the age of 32, he is equipped with custom neural implants that grant him faster reactions and heightened combat prowess. Hailing from a militaristic pirate colony intertwined with the sale of cutting-edge cybernetics, he appears to be a living embodiment of the future of warfare. Through seamless integration of technology and instinct, "Hybrid" moves with a swiftness that at times defies human limitations, often leaving adversaries bewildered by his rapid-fire tactics.
